alert.note: Alert for Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Osceola County through 700 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Holopaw to 11 miles northwest of Kenansville to 6 miles southwest of Lake Marian. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Marian, Holopaw, Harmony, and Forever Florida. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
